name: tbg_map_location
description: === Plugin's Name === Contributors: yariko0529 Tags: all tags here separate by coma Requires at least: 4.0 Tested up to: 5.3.2 Stable tag: 1.0.1 Requires PHP: 5.2.4 or higher License: GPLv2 or later License URI: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html

scripts.build:style: node-sass style.scss style.css --output-style expanded && postcss -r style.css
scripts.build:style-editor: node-sass style-editor.scss style-editor.css --output-style expanded && postcss -r style-editor.css
scripts.build:style-editor-customizer: node-sass style-editor-customizer.scss style-editor-customizer.css --output-style expanded && postcss -r style-editor-customizer.css
scripts.build:print: node-sass print.scss print.css --output-style expanded && postcss -r print.css
